cause.description:
This was started at SIS back in 2003 by Michael Lees and Don Newton. Money raised through various means like Saturday Fun Fairs, auctions, and sales goes to providing an education for girls in the rural Chinese countryside who otherwise would not have had one due to their gender and position in the family.
1. Girls should have the opportunity to receive an education.
cause.mission: provide tuition and materials for girls living in rural China.
cause.name: Guizhou SISters Program
